name: Jump Kid Retro
description:
Help the girl get her kid back, maybe you can win her heart?

Jump on enemies to kill them.

Beat the boss at the end of each world.

On every level you start with 2 stars. Loose a life, and you are down to 1 star. Collect the star that appears in the end of each level. Try to get and keep all 3 stars, it's friggin hard!!

Jump Kid is a retro platformer inspired by old school platform games.
8-bit retro graphics and fantastic chiptune music.
